messages.subject: Re: please spread the word: seeking permanent care-taking opportunity!!!
messages.msgSnippet: How exciting! Are you on either or both of these yahoos groups ? families on the road (fotr) unschooling families on the road (an off shoot) National Parks may
messages.messageBody:
How exciting!

Are you on either or both of these yahoos groups ?

families on the road (fotr)
unschooling families on the road (an off shoot)

National Parks may be an option. I will also look for the web links of jobs while on the road.

Joanne O'N.

messages.subject: Re: please spread the word: seeking permanent care-taking opportunity!!!
messages.msgSnippet: ... you might want to check out The Caretaker Gazette  www.caretaker.org Aloha - Alyse
messages.messageBody:
--- In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, "amyrotola" <amyrotola@...> wrote:
>
> I am wanting to travel and live independently while at the same time,
> continue to unschool my always unschooled daughter. We are seeking
> permanent (9-12months)paid care-taking opportunities. If you know of a
> friend or family that needs this service please email me with more
> info. THANKS!!!
>


you might want to check out The Caretaker Gazette www.caretaker.org

Aloha - Alyse

messages.subject: please spread the word: seeking permanent care-taking opportunity!!!
messages.msgSnippet: I am wanting to travel and live independently while at the same time, continue to unschool my always unschooled daughter. We are seeking permanent
messages.messageBody:
I am wanting to travel and live independently while at the same time,
continue to unschool my always unschooled daughter. We are seeking
permanent (9-12months)paid care-taking opportunities. If you know of a
friend or family that needs this service please email me with more
info. THANKS!!!
